file.name: petstore.yml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Swagger Petstore
  license:
    name: MIT
servers:
  - url: http://petstore.swagger.io/v1
paths:
  /pets:
    $ref: "./pets/pets.yml"

components:
  schemas:
    Date:
      type: string
      format: date
    DateWithExample:
      $ref: '#/components/schemas/Date'
      description: Date schema extended with a `default` value... Or not?
      default: 2000-01-01
